pros: Flexible, easy access, independent, rewarding, dynamic
cons: parking was difficult in the city

review_title: Not a ton of support from upper management
pros: The students were great to teach.
cons: Owner and upper management didn't support staff and faculty

review_title: My experience has been outstanding until the company changed ownership.
pros: The co-workers are great and united.  They have great medical, dental and eye benefits.  5% 401K match.  I love the students!
cons: You have to pay for parking.  The new management does not respect or care about the employees.  They will demote you to part time and take away benefits in a days notice.  They don't care about the students, only the number of enrollees.  The students do not get the equipment promised in their agreement.

review_title: Friendly atmosphere but management always undercut the abilities of the staff.
cons: Management does not understand that there are extenuating factors for low enrollments. Sometimes, it is what it is.
Payscale low, college closing, infrequent rases
